data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pešić, Vladimir (2013): A remarkable new Nilotonia species (Acari, Hydrachnidia, Anisitsiellidae) from percolating water of a cave in Cat Ba island in Halong Bay, Vietnam. Zootaxa 3710 (4): 372-380, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3710.4.6
